abstract: A reporter takes questions on personal actions to combat deforestation, the advance of deadly pine beetles, the limits of reseeding trees and the sins of the newspaper industry.
snippet: A reporter takes questions on personal actions to combat deforestation, the advance of deadly pine beetles, the limits of reseeding trees and the sins of the newspaper industry.
lead_paragraph: Readers responded to my recent article on forests and climate change with a flood of comments and questions. Here, I'm going to tackle a selected number with a bit of help from the scientists I interviewed for the piece. (Note that some questions have been shortened or recast slightly for clarity.)

headline.main: Q and A: Forests and Climate
